nodes.text: One Thousand, One Hundred and Thirty-Eight Wonders of the Ancient Galaxy

One Thousand, One Hundred and Thirty-Eight Wonders of the Ancient Galaxy was a book written by Doctor Ualp Xathan. It was published on the planet Beshka by TriPlanetary Press in 10 BBY. By 0 BBY, it was still considered a reference, and the young Tash Arranda once consulted it while redacting an essay for her droid tutor DV-9. The bibliographic reference for that edition was properly written as: "Xathan, Ualp. One Thousand, One Hundred and Thirty-Eight Wonders of the Ancient Galaxy. Beshka: TriPlanetary Press, 25 (GrS)."
The book's author, Ualp Xathan, was first introduced in Seoul Searching, the eighty-fourth issue in the Marvel Star Wars series of comics.
